# Business Prompt

This prompt captures business requirements for your project. These requirements will be used to generate business specifications.

## Requirements

### Actors

- IT Professional - Product Owners, Architects, Engineers, Testers exploring development tools
- Visitor - Any person landing on the website seeking to understand smaQit

### Use Cases

- Learn About smaQit - Visitor understands what smaQit is and its value proposition
- Explore Features - Visitor discovers key capabilities: stateful specs, versioned prompts, agile-ready, modular layers
- Connect via Social - Visitor finds GitHub/LinkedIn icons to connect with the project

### Success Metrics

- Value proposition clarity within 10 seconds of landing
- Visitor can recall "smaQit" and "Power up" association
- Social links discoverable within 5 seconds of looking

### Business Goals

- Introduce smaQit as an innovative Spec Driven Development (SDD) toolkit
- Position smaQit as the go-to open source SDD solution for IT professionals
- Convey empowering brand energy ("Power up with smaQit" - like a drummer striking a snare)

### Constraints

- One-page website (simple landing page format)
- Open source project (no pricing or commercial elements)
- Contact via GitHub and LinkedIn only (icons at bottom)
- Branding: empowering, energetic, "smaQit" sounds like "smack it"
